entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
